name: progressivity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of a rate of tax being progressive (= higher on larger amounts of money): In theory, the tax cuts increased the progressivity of income tax. It is possible to build progressivity into sales taxes too.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen oil prices and company profits are high, the state collects a progressivity surcharge. For less wealthy families, this tax substantially reduces the overall progressivity of federal taxes. This bill does very little to improve the general progressivity of our taxation system.
